title: '류지현호 어쩌나' 일본 WBC 대표팀 마지막 퍼즐, 韓 대표팀에 '결승타+5타점' 악몽 안겼던 외야수였다
content: [마이데일리 = 심혜진 기자] 2회 연속 월드베이스볼클래식(WBC) 우승을 노리는 일본 대표팀이 명단을 확정했다. 요시다 마사타카가 막차를 탔다. 일본 야구 대표팀은 4일 최종 1인을 발표했다. 요시다의 이름이 나왔다. 앞서 일본은 지난달 26일 대회 엔트리 30명 중 29명의 이름을 발표했다. 남은 1명의 주인공이 궁금했는데, 이날 요시다로 확정됐다. 다만 공식 최종 엔트리는 오는 6일 오전 MLB 네트워크를 통해 밝혀질 예정이다. 요시다는 자신의 SNS을 통해 "이 무게와 자부심을 다시 한 번 가슴에 새기고 전력을 다해 싸우겠다"고 각오를 밝혔다. 요시다는 이번이 2번째 WBC 출전이다. 앞서 2023년 대회에 출전했던 그는 대표팀의 핵심 타자로 활약했다. 7경기에 출전해 타율 0.409 2홈런 13타점 OPS 1.259라는 엄청난 성적을 썼다. 1라운드 한국과 경기에서는 3타수 3안타 5타점으로 활약했다. 3회 결승타를 때려냈다. 특히 멕시코와 준결승에서는 7회 동점 3점포로 팀을 위기에서 구해내며 강한 인상을 남겼다. 일본프로야구(NPB) 시절부터 요시다는 강타자로 이름을 날렸다. 대학 졸업 후 2016년 오릭스 버팔로스에 입단한 그는 NPB 7시즌 동안 타율 0.326 135홈런 474타점 OPS 0.957을 기록했다. 2020년과 2021년에는 각각 타율 0.350, 0.339를 기록하며 2년 연속 퍼시픽리그 타격왕에 올랐다. 이런 활약 속에 요시다는 2023시즌을 앞두고 보스턴 레드삭스와 5년 9000만 달러 계약을 맺고 미국 무대에 진출했다. 그러나 미국의 벽은 높았다. 일본에서의 모습을 보여주지 못했다. 지난해에는 마이너리그에서 시즌을 시작했다. 55경기 타율 0.266, 4홈런, OPS 0.696으로 최악의 시즌을 보냈다. 그럼에도 일본 대표팀에 승선했다. 지난 시즌 성적이 좋지는 않았지만 한국에 아픔을 줬던 선수이기에 류지현 호에게는 그의 합류가 썩 반가울 순 없다. 심혜진 기자 cherub0327@mydaily.co.kr - c마이데일리( www.mydaily.co.kr ). 무단전재&재배포 금지 -
creator: 심혜진 기자

title: 정신과 전문의도 '충격'...함소원, 이혼 후 친정엄마·진화와 1년 동거 [동치미]
content: [마이데일리 = 한소희 기자] 방송인 함소원이 전 남편 진화, 그리고 친정어머니와의 갈등을 솔직하게 털어놨다. 4일 MBN 예능 프로그램 '속풀이쇼 동치미' 측은 "함소원, 이혼 후 친정엄마·진화·딸과 1년간 한집살이?"라는 제목의 선공개 영상을 공개했다. 영상에서 함소원은 정신건강의학과 전문의 이광민을 만나 "2022년 12월 이혼을 마친 뒤, 2023년 베트남으로 건너갔을 당시 진화 씨가 찾아와 함께 지낸 적이 있다"며 "친정엄마와 진화, 딸 혜정이까지 네 사람이 한집에 살았다"고 밝혔다. 예상치 못한 동거 생활에 이광민 역시 놀라움을 감추지 못했다. 함소원은 "이혼 절차를 모두 마치고 베트남에 갔는데, 진화 씨가 '나는 그럼 어디서 살아야 하냐'고 하더라"며 그렇게 동거가 시작됐다고 설명했다. 이어 "둘이 살 때는 괜찮았지만, 엄마까지 함께 있으니 다툼이 생길 때마다 너무 난처했다"며 "싸우는 모습을 엄마가 지켜보는 상황이 반복됐고, 그렇게 거의 1년을 지냈다"고 털어놨다. 특히 친정어머니의 입장을 이해하게 된 계기도 언급했다. 함소원은 "엄마 입장에서는 이혼한 사위가 집에 들어와 나가지도 않고, 하루 종일 누워 있는 모습이 답답했을 것"이라며 "젊은 사람들은 누워서 휴대폰을 보는 게 자연스러울 수 있지만, 엄마 눈에는 달랐을 것"이라고 말했다. 이에 이광민은 "이미 이혼한 상태인데다 정서적으로 불안정하고, 뚜렷한 미래 계획도 보이지 않는 사람이 집안에 함께 있으면 충분히 화가 날 수 있다"며 "그 상황 자체가 장모 입장에서는 큰 스트레스였을 것"이라고 분석했다. 함소원은 또 친정엄마가 가장 충격을 받았던 일화를 전했다. 그는 "어느 날 진화 씨가 방에 누운 채로 엄마를 부르더니 '문 좀 닫아달라'고 했다고 하더라"며 "엄마가 정말 기가 찼다고 했다"고 고백했다. 이어 "우리 삼남매는 아버지의 사업 실패로 집안이 힘들어지면서 엄마 말 잘 들으며 자랐다"며 "반면 진화 씨는 어릴 때부터 모든 걸 부모가 해주는 환경에서 자라 아이처럼 행동하는 면이 있었다"고 말했다. 그러면서 "엄마에게는 진화 씨의 모습이 과거 힘들게 했던 아버지를 떠올리게 했을 수도 있겠다는 생각이 들었다"고 덧붙였다. 같은 날 공개된 또 다른 선공개 영상에서는 함소원의 어머니가 손녀 혜정이에 대한 걱정을 털어놓는 장면도 담겼다. 어머니는 딸과 진화의 재결합에 반대하며 "혜정이가 너무 혼란스러워한다"고 말했고, 이를 들은 김용만은 "할머니 말씀이 맞다"며 공감했다. 함소원의 어머니는 "싸우지만 않고 잘...

title: Քրեական ոստիկանները հանցավոր խումբ են բացահայտել. կատարվել են մեծամասշտաբ խուզարկություններ, կան ձերբակալվածներ. ՀՀ ՆԳՆ ոստիկանություն
content: ՆԳՆ Քրեական ոստիկանության գլխավոր եւ Լոռու մարզային վարչությունների ծառայողները համատեղ ձեռնարկած ծավալուն օպերատիվ-հետախուզական միջոցառումների արդյունքում պարզել են, որ մի խումբ անձինք ստեղծելով հանցավոր խումբ եւ ձեռք բերելով ապօրինի զենք-զինամթերք՝ նախապատրաստել են սպանություններ, կատարել ավազակային հարձակում եւ բնակարանային գողություններ: Միջամտելով տարբեր անձանց միջանձնային ու ֆինանսական խնդիրներին՝ դիմել են, այսպես կոչված, քրեական հեղինակության բարձրագույն կարգավիճակ ունեցող անձանց, ինչպես նաեւ մասնակցել են քրեական ենթամշակույթ կրող խմբավորման հավաքներին ու գործողություններին: Նախաձեռնվել է քրեական վարույթ։ Հանցավոր խմբի անդամներին մեղադրանքներ են առաջադրվել սպանության նախապատրաստության, սպանության փորձի, քրեական ենթամշակույթ կրող խմբավորմանը մասնակցելու, ապօրինի զենք-զինամթերք կրելու, խուլիգանության, ավազակության, գողության, գույք ոչնչացնելու կամ վնասելու եւ թմրամիջոցներ իրացնելու հատկանիշներով: Ձեռնարկած օպերատիվ-հետախուզական միջոցառումների արդյունքում հանցավոր խմբի անդամները հայտնաբերվել եւ ձերբակալվել են։ Քննչական կոմիտեի ծառայողների հետ համատեղ կատարված խոշորամասշտաբ խուզարկություններով նրանց բնակության վայրերում հայտնաբերվել են ապօրինի զենք-զինամթերք եւ թմրամիջոցներ: Հանցավոր խմբի 10 անդամների նկատմամբ հարուցվել է հանրային քրեական հետապնդում: Կատարվում է նախաքննություն։ Նոյյան տապան - Մամլո հաղորդագրություն Կարդացել են 116 անգամ

title: Դատախազությունը ներկայացնում է 2025 թվականին բացառիկ լիազորության շրջանակներում պետությանն ու համայնքներին վերադարձված անշարժ գույքերի ցանկը՝ ըստ մարզերի
content: Դատախազության կողմից պետական (համայնքային) շահերի պաշտպանության հայց հարուցելու բացառիկ լիազորության շրջանակներում ներկայացված հայցերով կայացված վճիռներով, կնքված հաշտության համաձայնություններով եւ դատախազական ներգործության միջոցների կիրառման արդյունքում, 2025 թվականին պետության (համայնքի) սեփականության իրավունքն է վերականգնվել, ինչպես նաեւ պետության (համայնքի) փաստացի տիրապետմանն է վերադարձվել շուրջ 176 միլիոն 868 միլիոն ԱՄՆ դոլարին համարժեք 66 միլիարդ 934 միլիոն դրամ շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքով գույք, այդ թվում՝ մանկապարտեզներ, մշակույթի տուն, մարզադաշտ, բնության հուշարձան, պուրակներ, հողատարածքներ եւ դրամական միջոցներ: Մասնավորապես. Հայաստանի Հանրապետության սեփականության իրավունքն է վերականգնվել՝ Երեւան քաղաքի Գ.Հովսեփյան փողոցի՝ հեռուստաաշտարակին հարող տարածքում գտնվող՝ 9420 քմ մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ շուրջ 360 միլիոն 690 հազար դրամ: Երեւան քաղաքի Գ.Հովսեփյան փողոցի հեռուստաաշտարակին հարող տարածքում գտնվող՝ 6640 քմ մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ 254 միլիոն 244 հազար դրամ: Երեւան քաղաքի Գ.Հովսեփյան փողոցի հեռուստաաշտարակին հարող տարածքում գտնվող՝ 16870 քմ մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ 645 միլիոն 950 հազար դրամ: Արագածոտնի մարզի Աշտարակ համայնքի Օրգով բնակավայրում գտնվող՝ 4 հա մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ շուրջ 32 միլիոն դրամ։ Արմավիրի մարզի Արմավիր համայնքի Ֆ. Նանսենի փողոցի 45 ավտոդրոմ հասցեում գտնվող՝ 6 հա մակերեսով հողատարածքը եւ 88.9 քմ մակերեսով ավտոդրոմը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ 77 միլիոն 140 հազար դրամ: Երեւան քաղաքի Գ.Հովսեփյան փողոցի՝ հեռուստաաշտարակին հարող տարածքում գտնվող «անտառային» նպատակային նշանակության 17 հազար 200 քմ մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ 658 միլիոն 586 հազար դրամ: Երեւան քաղաքի Գ.Հովսեփյան փողոցի՝ հեռուստաաշտարակին հարող տարածքում գտնվող՝ 17730 քմ մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ 1 միլիարդ 44 միլիոն 444 հազար դրամ: Երեւան քաղաքի Գ.Հովսեփյան փողոցի հեռուստաաշտարակին հարող տարածքում գտնվող՝ 7090 քմ մակերեսով հողամասը: Շուկայականին մոտարկված կադաստրային արժեքը՝ 417 միլիոն 659 հազար դրամ: Երեւան քաղաքի Ղափանցյան 59 հասցեում գտնվող՝ շուրջ 2.8 հա մակերեսով հողատարածքը, 35.2 քմ մակերեսով հյուրանոցը, 10.9 քմ մակերեսով պահակատունը, 41.2 քմ մակերեսով գրասենյակը, 182.8 քմ մակերեսով արհեստանոցը, 14.7 քմ եւ 198.9 քմ մակերեսով պահեստները, ինչպես նաեւ Ղափանցյան 59/11 հասցեի 0.0376 հա հողամասը: Փորձագետի կողմից...

title: Վարչապետը հանդիպում է ունեցել «Զայեդ» մարդկային եղբայրության մրցանակի գլխավոր քարտուղարի հետ
content: Աբու Դաբիում աշխատանքային այցի շրջանակում ՀՀ վարչապետ Նիկոլ Փաշինյանը հանդիպում է ունեցել «Զայեդ» մարդկային եղբայրության մրցանակի գլխավոր քարտուղար Մուհամմադ Աբդելսալամի հետ։ Մուհամմադ Աբդելսալամը շնորհակալություն է հայտնել վարչապետին հրավերն ընդունելու եւ այսօր կայանալիք «Զայեդ» մարդկային եղբայրության մրցանակաբաշխությանը մասնակցելու համար՝ կարեւորելով նրա ներկայությունը միջոցառմանը։ Կողմերը վստահություն են հայտնել, որ Հայաստանի Հանրապետության վարչապետի եւ Ադրբեջանի Հանրապետության նախագահի՝ մրցանակին արժանանալու փաստը նոր ազդակ կհաղորդի Հայաստանի Հանրապետության եւ Ադրբեջանի Հանրապետության միջեւ խաղաղության օրակարգին, ինչպես նաեւ կնպաստի տարածաշրջանում համագործակցության եւ կայունության ապահովման ուղղությամբ հետեւողական առաջընթացին։ Վարչապետ Փաշինյանը շնորհակալություն է հայտնել ջերմ հյուրընկալության եւ բարձր գնահատանքի համար՝ ընդգծելով խաղաղության եւ փոխադարձ վստահության վրա հիմնված նախաձեռնությունների կարեւորությունը։ Նոյյան տապան - Մամլո հաղորդագրություն Կարդացել են 116 անգամ

title: ‘시화공장 화재’ SPC삼립 “공급 차질 최소화 위한 대체 생산 체계 가동”
content: [스포츠한국 김나연 기자] 시화공장 화재로 생산이 중단됐던 SPC삼립이 공급 차질을 최소화하기 위한 대체 생산 체계를 가동하고 있다고 4일 밝혔다. SPC삼립은 금일 입장문을 통해 “당사는 화재 발생 직후 안전 확보를 최우선으로 공장 가동을 중단하고, 동시에 제품 공급 차질을 최소화하기 위한 대체 생산 체계를 가동하고 있다”고 밝혔다. 회사 측에 따르면 빵과 햄버거 번 등 주요 제품은 성남, 대구 등 주요 거점 생산시설과 외부 파트너사 등을 활용해 대체 생산 및 공급이 가능하도록 진행할 계획이며, 이를 통해 햄버거 업체 등 B2B 거래처 납품 영향을 최소화 할 예정이다. 앞서 시화공장은 전날 화재 발생 후 안전 확보를 위해 가동이 전면 중단된 상태다. 특히 불이 시작된 R동 3층은 식빵과 햄버거 번 등을 생산하는 주력 라인으로, 햄버거 프랜차이즈 등 외식업계 전반에 공급 차질이 빚어질 수 있다는 우려가 제기된 바 있다. SPC삼립 관계자는 “현재 현장 수습과 관계 당국의 안전 점검에 적극 협조하고 있다”며 “완료되는 대로 가능한 빠른 시일 내에 생산과 공급이 완전히 정상화될 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠다”고 밝혔다. 이어 “앞으로도 소비자와 거래처 등에 불편이 발생하지 않도록 안정적인 공급 관리에 만전을 기하겠다”고 덧붙였다.
creator: 김나연 기자

title: 李대통령 만난 경제계 “주요 10개 기업, 5년간 270조 지방 투자”
content: “올 신규채용 5만1600명...삼성 1만2000명·SK 8500명·한화 5780명” 이재용 “실적 올라 채용 여력 생겨”...李대통령 “일자리 창출노력 감사” 반도체·배터리·AI·탄소중립 중심 지방 투자 확대 올해만 66조 집행...신입 채용 비중 66% [헤럴드경제=정목희 기자] 경제계가 이재명 대통령과 만나 지역 경제 활성화와 청년 고용 창출을 위해 대규모 투자로 힘을 보태겠다는 뜻을 밝혔다. 류진 한국경제인협회(한경협) 회장은 4일 청와대에서 열린 ‘청년 일자리와 지방 투자 확대를 위한 기업 간담회’에서 “주요 10개 그룹은 향후 5년간 약 270조원 규모의 지방 투자를 계획하고 있다”며 “10대 그룹 외 기업들까지 포함하면 총 투자 규모는 300조원에 이를 것으로 본다”고 말했다. 이번 투자 계획은 수도권 이외 지역을 중심으로 반도체 설비 증설, 배터리 생산 및 연구개발(R&D) 역량 확충, 인공지능(AI) 전환, 탄소중립 인프라 구축 등 첨단·전략 산업 분야에 집중될 예정이다. 한경협은 해당 투자가 계획대로 집행될 경우, 향후 5년간 약 525조원의 생산 유발 효과와 221조원의 부가가치 유발 효과가 기대된다고 전망했다. 구체적인 집행 일정과 관련해 이규연 청와대 홍보소통수석은 브리핑에서 “총 270조원 가운데 66조원은 올해 집행될 예정”이라고 밝혔다. 이는 지난해보다 약 16조원 늘어난 규모다. 이는 지난해보다 약 16조원 증가한 규모다. 10개 기업의 올해 신규 채용 계획도 작년보다 2500명 늘어난 5만1600명으로 집계됐다. 이 가운데 66%인 3만4200명은 경력이 아닌 신입이 될 전망이다. 기업별 잠정 채용계획은 삼성 1만2000명, SK 8500명, LG 3000명 이상, 포스코 3300명, 한화 5780명 등이다. 특히 이재용 삼성전자 회장은 코스피의 활황 속에 이날 삼성전자가 최초로 시가총액 1천조원을 돌파한 상황과 맞물려 “삼성전자의 영업실적이 많이 올라가고 있어서 올해 조금 더 채용할 수 있는 여력이 생겼다”고 언급했다고 이 수석은 전했다. 이 수석은 “이들 10개 기업은 지난해 하반기 4천명을 추가로 채용했는데, 올해 여기에 더해 2500명을 늘렸다”며 “결과적으로 어려운 경제 여건 속에서도 작년의 당초 계획보다 6500명을 추가로 고용하는 셈”이라고 설명했다. 그러면서 “이에 이 대통령은 청년 일자리 창출 노력에 감사를 표시했다”고 밝혔다. 주요 기업들의 투자 계획과 관련해 류 회장은 “청년 실업은 그 자체도 문제지만 지역경제의 어려움과 깊이 연결된 문제도 정말 심각하다”며 “청년들은 일자리를 찾아 수도권으로 이동하고,...

title: ‘민폐 주차 끝판왕?’...도로 한가운데 떡하니 車 세우고 사라졌다
content: [헤럴드경제=장연주 기자] 대구 북구 한 도로에서 차선 두 개를 점령한 채 주차된 승용차 사진이 온라인에 공유돼 누리꾼들의 공분을 사고 있다. 지난 2일 온라인 커뮤니티 보배드림에는 도로 한가운데 주차된 은색 아반떼 차량의 모습이 담긴 사진이 올라왔다. 이 사진을 제보한 A씨는 “한 아주머니가 너무 심하게 불법 주차를 해 도저히 그냥 지나칠 수가 없었다”며 “오랜만에 사진 촬영해 안전신문고 앱으로 신고했다”고 밝혔다. 그는 이어 “불법주차 신고하고 잠시 후에 아줌마가 승용차에 돌아와 운전석에 탑승했다”며 “이미 신고가 끝난 상태라 창문을 두드린 뒤 (신고를 마친) 앱 화면을 보여주고 왔다”고 부연했다. 해당 사진에 누리꾼들은 “아무리 급해도 다른 차들이 다닐 수 있게는 해야 하는데”, “운전하다가 기름이 다 떨어진 상황이 아니라면, 저런 주차를 하는게 가능한 건가”, “민폐 주차의 끝판왕이다” 등의 반응을 보였다.
creator: 헤럴드경제

title: “벽 타고 전 여친 집 들어가려다” 추락한 40대 중상
content: [헤럴드경제=김성훈 기자] 벽을 타고 전 여자친구 집에 침입하려 한 40대 남성이 붙잡혔다. 청주흥덕경찰서는 주거침입 미수 및 재물손괴 혐의로 40대 남성 A 씨를 불구속 입건해 조사하고 있다고 4일 밝혔다. A 씨는 전날 오후 11시 50분께 청주시 흥덕구 한 빌라의 외벽 가스 배관을 타고 전 여자친구 주거지에 침입하려 한 혐의를 받고 있다. 그는 가스 배관을 타고 2층까지 오른 뒤 에어컨 실외기에 몸을 지탱했다가 실외기가 떨어지는 바람에 함께 추락하면서 중상을 입는 바람에 범행에 실패했다. 한 행인이 이 모습을 보고 그를 경찰에 신고했고, A 씨는 출동한 경찰에 붙잡혀 병원으로 옮겨졌다. A 씨는 당시 술에 취한 상태였으며, 전 여자친구가 연락을 받지 않는다는 이유로 범행한 것으로 알려졌다. 과거 스토킹 신고 이력은 없었던 것으로 파악됐다. 경찰은 정확한 사건 경위를 조사하고 있다.
creator: 헤럴드경제

title: Winter Olympics: Lindsey Vonn says she will race with ruptured ACL in left knee
content: American skiing legend Lindsey Vonn has announced that she will compete at the upcoming Winter Olympics at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics despite a torn ACL from a crash four days ago. The crash left Vonn with a left knee that had a “completely ruptured” ACL besides bone bruising “plus meniscal damage.” Vonn’s crash happened during a World Cup downhill race in Switzerland’s Crans-Montana on Friday/. After she extricated herself from the safety nets and skiing to the bottom of the course, Vonn, who will be one of the biggest names at the Winter Olympics, was taken to a hospital. Despite the agony of an injury that used to be a career-ended for high-performance athletes back in the day, Vonn said she was “confident” of competing. She returned to skiing on Tuesday, with barely three days of physical therapy to prop up her injured leg. Vonn’s first race comes on Sunday in the women’s downhill. She also plans on competing in super-G and the new team combined event. The opening women’s downhill training session is scheduled for Thursday. “My intention is to race everything,” Vonn said at a press conference. 01 ACL injuries explained What is an ACL rupture? How does it occur? The ACL, or anterior cruciate ligament, connects the femur, or thighbone, to the tibia, or shinbone. A rupture is a tear in the ligament that typically occurs in sports that involve quick changes in direction, such as basketball, soccer and skiing. Athletes typically hear a loud “pop” in the knee, which immediately gives out, followed by significant swelling. How bad is Vonn’s injury? A ruptured ACL plus damage to the meniscus — a piece of rubbery cartilage that acts as a shock absorber between the femur and the tibia — is considered a severe injury, said Dr. Mia Hagen, a sports medicine surgeon at UW Medicine in Seattle. It's often treated with surgery within months of the injury, according to guidelines from the American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons. It can take nine months to a year to recover after surgery. “Some people can return earlier, but others never return to their sport of injury,” Hagen said. How can she ski with a ruptured ACL? Vonn will rely on an external knee brace — and on her sheer physicality, Logan said. “Skiing is possible with a ruptured ACL,” she said. “It really relies on our quad strength, our hip strength and our neuromuscular control.” How could the injury affect her performance? If Vonn develops significant swelling or excess fluid in the knee joint, it...

title: Yevropa sudi 2021 yilda Navalniy qamoqqa olinishini noqonuniy deb topdi.
content: Inson huquqlari bo‘yicha Yevropa sudi (IHeS) Rossiyani Aleksey Navalniyni “noqonuniy ravishda ozodlikdan mahrum etgani” va unga nisbatan “insoniylikka zid munosabat” qo‘llagani uchun aybdor deb topdi. Foto: Yuriy Kochetkov / YeRA / TASS Qaror 3 fevral, seshanba kuni — siyosatchining Xarpdagi “Polyarnyy volk” alohida tartibli koloniyada vafot etganiga ikki yil to‘lganidan so‘ng chiqarildi . Sud Rossiyaga “nomoddiy zarar” uchun 26 ming yevro kompensatsiya to‘lash majburiyatini yukladi. Ish 2021 yil yanvarda Aleksey Navalniyning qamoqqa olinishiga taalluqli. IHeS qaroriga ko‘ra, uning hukmi “ichki qonunchilikning oldindan aytib bo‘lmaydigan qo‘llanishi”ga asoslangan va RF sudlari murojaat etuvchi vaziyatiga tatbiq etilmaydigan huquqiy normalarni “o‘xshatish tartibida” qo‘llagan. Strasburgdagi sud ma’lumotiga ko‘ra, Navalniy hibsda bo‘lgan davr mobaynida “uning hayotiga real va bevosita tahdid” mavjud bo‘lgan. U saqlash joylarida “bir nechta shakldagi shafqatsiz muomala”ga duchor etilgani, bu holatlar jamlanmasi esa “insoniylikka zid va qadr-qimmatni kamsituvchi munosabat”ni tashkil etgani qayd etildi. Sud Yevropa inson huquqlari konvensiyasining quyidagi moddalari buzilganini aniqladi: 2-modda — yashash huquqi, 5-modda 1-qism — ozodlik va shaxsiy daxlsizlik huquqi, 3-modda — insoniylikka zid munosabatni taqiqlash. Navalniy 2020 yil avgustda Tomsk–Moskva reysida hushidan ketgan. Samolyot Omskka majburiy qo‘ndirilgan, u yerda unga birinchi tibbiy yordam ko‘rsatilgan. Bir necha kundan so‘ng, hushiga kelmagan holda, u Berlindagi Charité klinikasiga olib o‘tilgan va davolash hamda reabilitatsiya davom ettirilgan. Germaniya Qurolli kuchlarining maxsus laboratoriyasi olib borgan toksikologik tahlilda uning tanasidan “Novichok” guruhiga mansub asab-falajlovchi modda izlari topilgan. Shvetsiya va Fransiya laboratoriyalari, shuningdek Kimyoviy qurolni taqiqlash tashkiloti (KQTT) ekspertlari ham mustaqil ravishda shu xulosaga kelgan. 2021 yil yanvarda Navalniy Rossiyaga qaytgan va darhol hibsga olingan, keyinchalik sudlanib jazo tayinlangan. Uch yil o‘tib, 2024 yil 16 fevralda u Yamal-Nenets avtonom okrugidagi koloniyada ko‘p yillik jazoni o‘tayotgan paytida, aniqlanmagan sharoitlarda vafot etdi.

title: Urbanizatsiyada raqamli tizimlar: “Yer banki” va “Uy-joy” platformasi yaratiladi.
content: Shavkat Mirziyoyev urbanizatsiya va uy-joy qurilishi jarayonlarini raqamlashtirish, yer ajratish va qurilishni rejalashtirishni yagona tizimga birlashtirish bo‘yicha yangi takliflar bilan tanishdi. Foto: Prezident matbuot xizmati Taqdimotda urbanizatsiya va uy-joy qurilishi sohasini samarali boshqarish uchun raqamli texnologiyalarni keng joriy etish zarurligi ta’kidlandi . Shu maqsadda bosh va master rejalarning yagona ma’lumotlar bazasini shakllantirish, qurilishga tayyor yer maydonlari bo‘yicha alohida elektron baza — “Yer banki”ni yaratish taklif etildi. Mazkur tizim orqali qurilishga tayyor yer maydonlari to‘g‘risidagi ma’lumotlar to‘planadi, barcha zarur ruxsatnomalar va tayyorgarlik jarayonlari auksionga chiqarilishidan oldin rasmiylashtiriladi. Natijada tadbirkor yer maydonini auksionda yutib olgandan so‘ng qo‘shimcha hujjat yig‘masdan, barcha ruxsat va kelishuvlarni avtomatik tarzda olish imkoniga ega bo‘ladi. Qurilishga tayyor bo‘lmagan yerlarni auksionga chiqarish taqiqlanadi. Shuningdek, ko‘p kvartirali uylarning yagona geoaxborot bazasi, “eskrou” tizimi, quruvchilar reytingi va boshqa raqamli yechimlarni o‘z ichiga olgan “Uy-joy” axborot tizimini ishlab chiqish taklif qilindi. Ushbu platforma orqali uy-joy qurilishi, sotuvi, moliyalashtirish va nazorat jarayonlarini shaffof va tizimli yo‘lga qo‘yish ko‘zda tutilmoqda. Raqamli tizimlarni joriy etish yer resurslaridan samarali foydalanish, qurilish jarayonlarini qisqartirish va sohada ochiqlikni ta’minlashga xizmat qiladi. Prezident taqdim etilgan takliflarni ma’qullab, ularni bosqichma-bosqich amalga oshirish bo‘yicha mutasaddilarga topshiriqlar berdi.
creator: отабек матназаров

title: AI cameras do change driver behaviour, Australian example shows
content: The City of Cape Town is awaiting the green light from the National Director of Public Prosecutions to roll out AI-assisted cameras to detect cellphone use and seatbelt offences. The tech has already been trialled on motorists using Philip Kgosana Drive in the Mother City, explains Jacobs. Similar technology has been in use in parts of Australia for several years, where penalties include heavy fines and the loss of demerit points. “It's definitely had a huge impact,” says Peter Khoury, Head of Media at the National Roads and Motorists' Association in Australia. "It's been very effective because what it's allowed law enforcement to do is focus on other things instead of trying to catch drivers using their phones illegally." Khoury explains that mobile phone use while driving is one of the most heavily penalised offences under Australia’s demerit points system. ALSO READ: Texting and driving? City of Cape Town to use AI cameras to catch you Speaking on CapeTalk, the City's Traffic Services spokesperson, Kevin Jacobs, explained that if approved, camera footage would first be analysed to ensure accuracy before any fines were issued. "Because it's new technology, everything has to be adjudicated and checked," he said. Khoury explains that similar checks are in place in Australia. "The government here doesn't just rely on the camera alone. Before the fines are issued, the AI-driven image is then checked by a human to provide that extra level of transparency." And that's not the only safeguard in place, explains Khoury. "Also, the driver, if you think you've been fined unfairly, you can request a copy of the image to see for yourself," he says. title: Coopération judiciaire : La ministre malgache de la Justice à Maurice
content: La ministre malgache de la Justice, Fanirisoa Ernaivo, est attendue à Maurice ce mercredi 4 février avec une délégation de 14 officiers, dont des magistrats et enquêteurs spécialisés du Bureau indépendant anticorruption. Cette visite vise à renforcer la coopération judiciaire entre Maurice et Madagascar, notamment dans les affaires de crimes financiers et de blanchiment d’argent impliquant l’homme d’affaires Mamy Ravatomanga. L'homme d’affaires malgache, Mamy Ravatomanga, est visé par des enquêtes pour blanchiment d’argent et fraude économique à Maurice et à Madagascar. Selon la délégation malgache, la justice mauricienne poursuivra ses enquêtes de manière autonome, tandis que Madagascar entend préparer la prise en charge du dossier sur son territoire. La mission prévoit des échanges techniques avec l’Attorney General, la Financial Crimes Commission et d’autres institutions pour consolider la collaboration régionale contre la criminalité économique transfrontalière.
creator: vilorsha armoogum

title: Ernährung: Warum ausreichend Jod für die Gesundheit wichtig ist
Ashmit Patel reflects on 12-month recovery journey following an injury while playing cricket: ‘I never forget that fall last January’
content: Ashmit Patel served massive fitness goals by opening up about suffering a serious fall during a cricket game, after which he was advised to undergo surgery by at least two doctors. “One year ago, the game stopped. I never forget that fall last January. Pain was one thing, but the uncertainty was worse. Torn hamstring, damaged ligaments, and a gash...thankfully, just above my eye. Doctors told me that the road back would be long. They told me surgery might be the only way. The first two doctors suggested surgery, and I was hoping for a miracle solution. The third doctor shared that the retraction has not increased to a great extent ...so manage it the way it is, and no surgery was required,” the actor shared in an Instagram post. Adding that the treating doctor also advised him to rest it out for 3-4 months before resuming tennis and gymming, Ashmit, 48, continued, “I really wanted to avoid surgery. I chose the daily grind, the small wins, and a belief that my body could heal itself if I did the work. One year later, the scars are fading, and the strength is slowly coming back. This wasn’t just about a leg. It was about the heart. Looking back, I realise this injury didn’t break me, it built me.” Taking a leaf out of his fitness diary, we asked an expert on the nitty-gritties of suffering a serious fall and what recovery looks like. A sudden fall during sports may seem harmless, but it can cause serious damage beneath the surface.” Muscles can tear, ligaments can stretch or break, and surrounding tissues can swell quickly. Pain is immediate, but the greater worry is how severe the injury is and whether normal movement will return,” said Dr Sarang Deshpande, consultant, orthopaedics and joint replacement, KIMS Hospitals, Thane. When scans reveal torn muscles or damaged ligaments, doctors may suggest surgery as the quickest way to recover. “This approach aims to stabilise the area and prevent long-term weakness. However, surgery is not always necessary. The choice depends on joint stability, pain levels, and how the body reacts in the first few weeks,” said Dr Deshpande. When can recovery happen without surgery? According to Dr Deshpande, if the injured area remains stable and improves with rest, many injuries can heal through a structured rehabilitation program. “Gradual exercises help rebuild muscle strength and regain flexibility. The body is quite capable of healing when given enough time and the right support for movement,” said Dr Deshpande. Why does...

title: Vivek Oberoi seeks Personality Rights: What it means and why Bollywood celebrities are heading to court
content: Vivek Oberoi has joined the growing list of celebrities taking legal steps to protect their personality rights. The actor and entrepreneur has filed a suit in the Delhi High Court seeking to prevent unauthorised use of his identity. Vivek’s plea has put the spotlight back on a growing trend as he joins an A-list club, including Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan , Abhishek Bachchan , R Madhavan , Anil Kapoor and Karan Johar among others. But what exactly are these rights, and why has it suddenly become the most sought-after thing in B-Town? In the past, a star’s biggest worry was a bad review or a box-office flop. Today, their biggest threat is a digital ghost of themselves roaming the internet, selling things they don’t like and saying things they never said. For stars, their identity is tied to their career and brand value. When fake content or impersonations spread online, it can create confusion, distort reputation, and even affect lives and mental peace. Daler Mehndi was the first celebrity to seek protection right The battle for celebrity personality rights in India actually started with a turban and a doll. Back in 2002, Punjabi pop sensation Daler Mehndi became the first Indian celebrity to successfully fight for these rights. A company was selling miniature dolls that not only looked like him, complete with his robes and colorful turbans, but also sang snippets of his hits. The Delhi High Court ruled in his favour, establishing a landmark precedent: a celebrity’s persona has commercial value, and you can’t just “merchandise” a human being without their consent. What exactly are ‘Personality Rights’? Think of personality rights as a digital “No Trespassing” sign. In easy terms, it is the right of a famous person to control how their name, image, voice, and other unique characteristics (like a signature catchphrase or a specific walk) are used by others. It’s based on the idea that a celebrity has spent years building their reputation. Therefore, if anyone is going to make money off that reputation, whether by putting their face on a t-shirt or using an AI version of their voice to sell insurance, it should be the celebrity themselves, or by their permission. In India, there isn’t a single law that spells this out, the way copyright does for music or films. Instead, courts have gradually developed protections through legal principles, including intellectual property and constitutional rights, to step in when someone’s identity is exploited....

title: Illegal cutting of heritage peepal trees: NGT slaps Rs 80,000 fine on Faridabad official
content: The National Green Tribunal (NGT) has imposed an environmental compensation of Rs 80,000 on the Deputy Director of the Faridabad Animal Husbandry and Dairying department in connection with the illegal felling of eight old pipal trees, in violation of forest department permission that required their transplantation. The tribunal directed the Divisional Forest Officer (DFO) to take action against those responsible and ordered the fine to be deposited with the Haryana State Pollution Control Board (HSPCB) within four weeks. In its order dated January 21, the NGT’s principal bench, comprising Chairperson Justice Prakash Shrivastava and Expert Member Dr A Senthil Vel, pointed to illegal cutting of heritage peepal trees on the premises of the Deputy Director’s office in Faridabad for construction of a hospital. “We are of the view that the Joint Committee has rightly recorded a finding about the illegal felling of eight trees,” it said. The Tribunal had formed the joint committee on December 10, 2024, comprising representatives from the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) and the Regional Office of the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEF&CC), Chandigarh , to investigate the matter. The committee’s report, dated January 31, 2025, and an updated status report confirmed that permission under the Haryana Land Preservation Act was for felling 44 trees and transplanting eight peepal trees. It found stumps of the peepal trees at the site, concluding a violation of condition no. 12 which mandated transplantation of the eight trees and planting five times the number of felled trees (260 in total). Referring to the Joint Committee report submitted, the bench said permission was granted on October 25, 2023, by the DFO, Faridabad, to fell 44 trees but this excluded the peepal trees, which were to be transplanted. “We are of view that Respondent No. 2 has violated condition no. 12 [transplanting] of the permission dated 25.10.2023. Accordingly, we direct the Divisional Forest Officer to take appropriate action against the person responsible for violating the said condition in accordance with law expeditiously...,” said the bench. It further noted: “Compensatory afforestation of planting five trees against each felling of tree has been done, but that alone is not sufficient because there is immediate loss of carbon sink due to illegal felling of eight fully grown mature trees whereas growing of saplings and creation of such a carbon sink again will...

title: Huh?! Jigglypuff is Warming Up For a Pokémon 30th Anniversary 'Special Video' at The Super Bowl
content: Pokémon will air a "special video" to mark the franchise's 30th anniversary during this weekend's Super Bowl LX. A teaser trailer published online this afternoon includes fan-favorite Jigglypuff seemingly backstage, performing vocal warmup exercises. And yes, we do hear the original Jigglypuff song from the first season of the Pokémon anime. Exactly what Pokémon's Super Bowl spot will contain, we can only guess — though fans will certainly be hoping the franchise takes advantage of the event's huge global audience to offer a glimpse at its widely-anticipated 10th generation. Celebrate 30 years of Pokémon with a special video debuting during Super Bowl LX on February 8! #Pokemon30 pic.twitter.com/gOgvTnlkdW — Pokémon @ Lumiose City ? (@Pokemon) February 4, 2026 2026 is expected to be an enormous year for Pokémon, as the world dominating series celebrates the fact it has been three decades since its original games launched in Japan on the Game Boy. We know for sure that at least one new Pokémon game will arrive this year, too — the promising-looking life sim spin-off Pokémon Pokopia — but fans are hungry for more. While not announced yet for certain, it's widely-expected that a full Pokémon Presents broadcast (akin to a Nintendo Direct) will air on the series' actual anniversary, February 27. A similar broadcast has taken place regularly over the last few years. It's here that fans are anticipating the next generation of Pokémon games and creatures to get their proper reveal, exactly four years on from the series' ninth generation games for Nintendo Switch, Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet. Last year, leaked information hit the internet that purported to reveal work-in-progress details of the upcoming games . Now, all eyes will be on Pokémon itself to make its next generation official. Could we get a glimpse of all that at the Super Bowl? Or is Jigglypuff simply planning a half-time show-style recital? It would be a lot of money to spend just for a singalong. There's no word yet exactly when during the hours-long event that the Pokémon video may appear. Tom Phillips is IGN's News Editor. You can reach Tom at tom_phillips@ign.com or find him on Bluesky @tomphillipseg.bsky.social

title: Məşhur yazarın pedofil milyarderə göndərdiyi mesaj
content: ABŞ-də yeni dərc olunan Ceffri Epşteyn sənədləri beynəlxalq ictimaiyyətdə geniş rezonans doğurub. Medianews.az xəbər verir ki, sənədlər arasında Hindistanda anadan olmuş, dünyaca məşhur yazıçı və ruhani Deepak Chopra adına aid olduğu iddia edilən bir elektron məktub xüsusi diqqət çəkib. İddialara görə, sözügedən e-poçtda Chopra tərəfindən Epşteynə ünvanlandığı deyilən “Tanrı uydurmadır. Gözəl qızlar gerçəkdir” ifadəsi yer alıb. Bu cümlə sənədlərin yayılmasından sonra xarici mətbuatda və sosial şəbəkələrdə geniş müzakirələrə səbəb olub. İnternetdə yayılan sənəd “Dünya şokdadır!” başlıqları ilə paylaşılaraq, məşhur müəllifin pozğun milyarderə “şirin qız” mesajı göndərdiyi iddiaları ilə gündəmə gətirilib. Mövzu qısa zamanda sosial mediada trendə çevrilib və istifadəçilər arasında kəskin mübahisələrə yol açıb. Xarici mətbuatın təhlillərində qeyd olunur ki, bu ifadələr birbaşa və tam təsdiqlənmiş yazışma kimi təqdim edilmir. Bildirilir ki, Chopra adının yer aldığı e-poçt trafiki əsasən gündəlik yazışmalar və xəbər paylaşımlarından ibarətdir. Sözügedən cümlənin konteksti və həqiqiliyi ilə bağlı müzakirələr isə hələ də davam edir. Ekspertlər və hüquq dairələri vurğulayır ki, Epşteyn sənədlərində bir şəxsin adının çəkilməsi avtomatik olaraq ittiham və ya birbaşa əlaqə anlamına gəlmir. Sənədlərin böyük hissəsinin iddialar, şərhlər və dolayı məlumatlardan ibarət olduğu qeyd olunur. Hazırda Jeffrey Epstein ilə bağlı yayılan bu iddialara dair Deepak Chopra tərəfindən hər hansı rəsmi açıqlama verilməyib. Medianews.az

title: ‘You're playing like Biden didn't exist’: Sen Graham rips media at Trump event over ICE question
content: A routine Oval Office Q&A turned into a fiery media showdown when President Donald Trump tossed a question to Senator Lindsey Graham and the South Carolina Republican launched straight into a blistering attack on the press. As Trump boasted that his second term is 'blowing the first one away,' Graham hyped him up as 'Reagan plus' before pivoting to accuse reporters of distorting the truth and protecting sanctuary city policies. The unscripted moment quickly became a display of loyalty politics, with Graham playing defender-in-chief while Trump basked in the praise. Critics called it political theater; supporters said it was long-overdue pushback against the media narrative. Either way, the exchange captured how tense—and personal—the battle between Trump world and the press has become.

'No govt can and should aim for permanency': Kamal Haasan’s thunderous RS speech
content: Makkal Needhi Maiam (MNM) founder and Rajya Sabha MP Kamal Haasan today expressed his concern about the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) exercise. During a debate in the Uppoer House, the actor turned politician accused the commissions of denying voters of their right. "I consider this moment an honour... I was introduced to my language by my Tamil teachers. One of them was a political leader, C.N. Annadurai... He taught us to confront any invasion on our language, our culture, and our rights... You may say I'm not qualified to speak on economics with my high school dropout status. Let it be so. Nevertheless. As an extramural student of whatever university you all hail from, I have an opinion as a Tamilian. MK Gandhi helped me write this speech without anger. Periyar helped me add logic. Anna helped me understand this building... My imminent concern is the forthcoming elections. I wrote it down thinking only of the impending present. I call it the spell-checked story of the living dead. We want to cast a vote, sir, and commissions are checking our right to vote. They are checking the spellings and addresses and that too erroneously. We just want to cast our vote," he said.

title: Reform councillor steps down as head of Kent’s cost-cutting drive
Two held for ‘raping’ woman in Surat
content: Two persons – one from Uttar Pradesh and the other from West Bengal – were arrested for allegedly raping a woman, police said on Wednesday. One of the accused also falsely claimed to the woman earlier that he belongs to a particular community, police said. Police identified the two arrested accused as Aman Verma (21), and ‘Rohit’ alias Tauhidul Shaikh, in his late 20s. Both have been booked on charges of rape, illegal detention and life threat. On Wednesday, the duo were produced before the Surat district court that sent them to police custody for two days. According to the police complaint, the victim, who is in her 20s and hails from Rajasthan, met Aman Verma (a waiter at a hotel in Surat) through social media in December last year. During regular chats and video calls, Aman told her to visit Surat on his birthday in January. She travelled to Surat and was picked up by Aman and his friend Tauhidul, who introduced himself as ‘Rohit’ to her. They took her to a hotel, where Aman allegedly offered a spiked soft drink to her and raped her after she lost consciousness. On the next day, he took her to the residence of the other accused, where she was allegedly raped by them. A few days ago, she managed to escape from the house of reached her hometown in Rajasthan, where she registered an offence of rape against Aman and Rohit with the local police station. The rape complaint was transferred to the juridisdictional police station in Surat city, as the alleged crime happened there. A senior police officer said, “The accused had illegally confined her to the house, where she was raped and threatened. We have asked her to visit the police station here so that we can get more information. Medical examination of both the accused has been done.”

‘Every comeback has taught me something about life’: Rishabh Pant says his fitness is getting better and he will be back soon on the field
content: Rishabh Pant, who has been out of the Indian team since January 10, when he sustained a right-sided internal oblique muscle tear (side strain) after being struck above the waist by a ball from a throwdown specialist during a practice session in Vadodara, said on Wednesday that he was recovering well and is hopeful of returning to competitive cricket as soon as possible. “My fitness is getting better day by day. I am working hard at the Centre of Excellence and I think I’m going to be out (on the field) soon,” Pant said. “When I am injured, one thing that always keeps me close to the game is the love for the game and the support from the people around you. As a cricketer, you always have to keep adding to your game. I need to keep looking to get better in each and every aspect of my overall gameplay,” he added. Reflecting on multiple comebacks in his career, Pant said time away from the field has helped him develop a different outlook towards both cricket and life. However, he admitted that the absence of top-level competition remains the hardest part of being sidelined. “Every comeback has taught me something about life. It has taught me more gratitude, how you see things around you, and wanting to be committed to something that really makes you happy. When I am injured, the thing I miss the most is really enjoying the game. You love the game so much, but you also enjoy it while playing it at the top level. That’s something I miss truly,” he said. Ahead of the 1st India vs New Zealand ODI in Vadodara, The left-hander was involved in a lengthy batting session before he got injured, where he focused on his forward defence, while trying the occasional lap shot. Pant last played an ODI for India against Sri Lanka in July 2024. He was part of the squad that won the Champions Trophy in 2025, but did not feature in a single match.

title: NVE: Rekordlite snø i fjellet i sør
Trump’s border czar announces 700 immigration officers to immediately leave Minnesota
content: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The Trump administration is reducing the number of immigration enforcement officers in Minnesota after state and local officials agreed to cooperate by turning over arrested immigrants, border czar Tom Homan said Wednesday.About 700 of the roughly 3,000 federal officers deployed around Minnesota will be withdrawn, Homan said. The immigration operations have upended the Twin Cities and escalated protests, especially since the killing of protester Alex Pretti, the second fatal shooting by federal officers in Minneapolis.“Given this increase in unprecedented collaboration, and as a result of the need for less public safety officers to do this work and a safer environment, I am announcing, effective immediately, we’ll draw down 700 people effective today — 700 law enforcement personnel,” Homan said during a news conference.Homan said last week that federal officials could reduce the number of federal agents in Minnesota, but only if state and local officials cooperate. His comments came after President Donald Trump seemed to signal a willingness to ease tensions in the Minneapolis and St. Paul area.Homan pushed for jails to alert ICE to inmates who could be deported, saying transferring such inmates to the agency is safer because it means fewer officers have to be out looking for people in the country illegally.The White House has long blamed problems arresting criminal immigrants on places known as sanctuary jurisdictions, a term generally applied to state and local governments that limit law enforcement cooperation with the Department of Homeland Security.When questioned, Homan said he thinks the ICE operation in Minnesota has been a success.“Yeah, I just listed a bunch of people we took off the streets of the Twin Cities, so I think it’s very effective as far as public safety goes,” Homan said. “Was it a perfect operation? No. No. We created one unified chain of command to make sure everybody is on the same page. And make sure we follow the rules. I don’t think anybody, purposely, didn’t do something they should have done.”Associated Press reporter Corey Williams in Detroit contributed.
creator: associated press

title: «Gelbe Karte» für den Intendanten der Salzburger Festspiele
content: In einer ausserordentlichen Sitzung zeigte das Kuratorium der Festspiele dem 67-Jährigen die «Gelbe Karte», wie ein Sprecher der Salzburger Ministerpräsidentin und Kuratoriumsvorsitzenden Karoline Edtstadler sagte. Anlass ist das Vorgehen Hinterhäusers bei der anstehenden Auswahl der neuen Schauspielleitung. Er schien durch Äusserungen gegenüber der «Kronen Zeitung» die frühere Direktorin des Burgtheaters, Karin Bergmann, zu favorisieren und hatte zugleich gesagt, sie habe an den Auswahl-Hearings teilgenommen. Bergmann habe sich aber weder beworben noch an den Hearings teilgenommen, hiess es aus dem Kuratorium. Hinterhäuser selbst war zunächst für eine Stellungnahme nicht erreichbar. Die Entscheidung über Personalien kann der Intendant formal alleine fällen. Das Kuratorium als eine Art Aufsichtsrat ist unter anderem für die strategische Ausrichtung und die Rolle von Sponsoren wichtig. Auswahlverfahren vorläufig gestoppt Hinterhäuser, der bei der Sitzung nicht anwesend war, soll sich bei der nächsten ordentlichen Kuratoriumssitzung am 26. Februar zu den Vorgängen äussern. Das Auswahlverfahren ist vorläufig gestoppt. Es hatten sich 23 Kandidaten und Kandidatinnen beworben. Fünf davon waren beim Hearing. Die Salzburger Festspiele bieten jeden Sommer rund 200 Musik-, Theater- und Opernaufführungen. 2025 wurden rund 250.000 Besucher gezählt. Diskussion auch über Vertrag des Intendanten Edtstadler kritisierte das Verhalten des Intendanten. «Ein vertrauensvolles Vorgehen ist das nicht.» Er habe das abgesprochene Prozedere umgangen. «Er hat den Auftrag negiert», sagte Salzburgs Bürgermeister Bernhard Auinger zum eigentlich vereinbarten Prozess eines Hearings der Bewerberinnen und Bewerber. Bei der Sitzung des Kuratoriums sei auch über den Vertrag des Intendanten gesprochen worden, hiess es. Hinterhäuser ist seit 2016 künstlerischer Leiter des weltweit höchst renommierten Festivals. Sein Vertrag wurde vorzeitig bis 2031 verlängert - mit einer Ausstiegs-Option 2029. Die Leitung des Schauspiels muss nach der vorzeitigen Beendigung des Vertragsverhältnisses mit Marina Davydova im Jahr 2024 neu besetzt werden. Angesichts des damaligen Wirbels hatte das Kuratorium auf einem sehr transparenten Auswahlprozess bestanden.

title: ‘You’ll make Kal Ho Naa Ho again’: Irrfan Khan refused D-Day, accepted only when Anurag Kashyap said ‘Nikkhil Advani behak gaya tha’
content: Those eyes. Those bloody eyes of Irrfan Khan. That line, by itself, says everything about the talent the late legend possessed. One could go on counting the many performances where his eyes shone the brightest, moments where they spoke before words ever could. And yet, not many would include Nikkhil Advani’s highly underrated D-Day in that list, where, once again, his eyes shocked, disarmed, evaded, and confounded, and in doing so, moved you. What makes it even more compelling is the knowledge that despite how extraordinary he was in the film, he almost rejected it. He was unsure of Advani’s capabilities as a director, uncertain whether he could helm a no-nonsense spy actioner. In an exclusive conversation with SCREEN, Advani revealed Irrfan’s initial reaction upon hearing the script. “Irrfan kept telling me, ‘Yaar, tu Kal Ho Naa Ho banayega toh. Kal Ho Naa Ho ke jaise beech mein gaane daalega. Itna achha script hai, tu yeh sab kar dega uss mein.’” (You’ll make it like Kal Ho Naa Ho, add songs in between. It’s such a good script, you’ll end up doing all that to it.) Advani went on to share that it was Anurag Kashyap who ultimately convinced Irrfan to come on board. “Then it was Kashyap who told him, ‘Arey, isne Iss Raat Ki Subah Nahin likhi thi. Yeh behak gaya tha abhi, wapas aa gaya hai. Tu kar le, kar le.’ ” (He wrote Iss Raat Ki Subah Nahin. He had gone off track for a bit, but he’s back now. You should do it, go ahead.”) Advani also pointed out the irony that despite Kashyap’s influence on many of Irrfan’s career decisions, the two never actually collaborated on a film together. Several projects Irrfan took up, he said, were based on Kashyap’s informal advice, “do this, do that”, rather than formal collaborations. The filmmaker further revealed that Irrfan briefly felt insecure when he learned that Rishi Kapoor would be playing the role of Dawood Ibrahim. “When I called him and told him that Rishi Kapoor is doing Dawood, he said, ‘Yaar, abhi toh sab kuch le jaayega woh phir. Lines bhi saari achhi ussi character ke paas hain. Rishi sir is too good.’ ” (Man, he’s going to take everything away now. All the best lines are with that character. Rishi sir is too good.) Also Read | ‘Tu hoga Oscar-winning actor par...’: ‘Frustrated’ Rishi Kapoor would scold Irrfan Khan on D-Day sets, recalls Nikkhil Advani In the same conversation, Advani reflected on how D-Day became a turning point in his career. “D-Day didn’t just change me as a filmmaker, it made people...

title: 40 Yaşında Ortaya Çıkıyor, Çoğu Kişi Geç Fark Ediyor! Nefes Almak Zorlaşıyorsa Sebebi Bu Olabilir
content: Sigara, KOAH’ın en büyük nedeni ve hastalık yıllar içinde sessizce ilerliyor. Öksürük ve nefes darlığı çoğu zaman hafife alındığı için tanı geç konuluyor. Oysa erken tanı ve sigaranın bırakılmasıyla hastalık kontrol altına alınabiliyor. Göğüs Hastalıkları Uzmanı Dr. Hale Moral, "KOAH'ta en büyük risk sigaradır. Sigara bırakıldığında hastalar çok daha sağlıklı ve kaliteli bir yaşam sürebiliyor" dedi. Dr. Hale Moral, Kronik Obstrüktif Akciğer Hastalığı (KOAH) hakkında önemli açıklamalarda bulundu. KOAH'ın hava yollarının kalıcı ve kronik şekilde daralmasıyla ortaya çıkan ciddi bir solunum hastalığı olduğunu belirten Dr. Moral, hastalığın en önemli nedeninin sigara olduğunu vurguladı. Günde bir paket sigara içen bireylerde ortalama 20 yıl sonra KOAH geliştiğini ifade eden Moral, "Bu hastalar genellikle 40 yaş civarında bize başvuruyor. Ancak çoğu hasta öksürük, balgam ve nefes darlığını sigaraya bağlayarak şikâyetlerini ciddiye almıyor ve geç dönemde hekime geliyor" şeklinde konuştu. "Hasta öyküsü ve sigara geçmişi bizim için çok önemli" KOAH'ın yalnızca sigarayla sınırlı olmadığını belirten Dr. Hale Moral, özellikle kırsal bölgelerde ısınma amacıyla kullanılan hayvan atıkları gibi biyokütle yakıtların ve mesleki toza maruz kalmanın da hastalığın gelişiminde etkili olduğunu söyledi. Tanı sürecine ilişkin bilgi veren Dr. Moral, "Hasta öyküsü ve sigara geçmişi bizim için çok önemli. Fizik muayenenin ardından Solunum Fonksiyon Testi, KOAH tanısında önemlidir. Akciğer grafisi ve kan tetkikleri de tanıya yardımcı olur" diye belirtti. "Erken tanı ve doğru tedaviyle bu noktaya gelmeden hastalık kontrol altına alınabilir" Asıl mücadelenin tanı konulduktan sonra başladığını vurgulayan Göğüs Hastalıkları Uzmanı Dr. Hale Moral, tedavinin temelini zararlı etkenlerden uzaklaşmanın oluşturduğunu belirtti. Sigaranın bırakılması, ev içi duman ve mesleki risklerin ortadan kaldırılmasının şart olduğunu ifade eden Dr. Moral, bronşları gevşetici inhaler tedavilerin nefes darlığını önemli ölçüde azalttığını söyledi. Aşılar ve egzersizin hayati derecede önemli, KOAH ataklarının ise en sık nedeninin enfeksiyonlar olduğuna dikkat çeken Dr. Moral, hastalara grip ve zatürre aşılarını önerdiklerini belirtti. Ayrıca solunum ve vücut egzersizleriyle hastaların yaşam kalitesinin artırılabileceğini ifade eden Dr. Moral, hastaların büyük bir bölümünün doktora geç evrede...

title: Əbu-Dabidə üçtərəfli görüş
content: Əbu-Dabidə ABŞ-nin vasitəçiliyi ilə Rusiya və Ukrayna arasında danışıqların ikinci raundu başlayıb. “Qafqazinfo” xəbər verir ki, bununla bağlı Rusiya KİV məlumat yayıb. Bildirilib ki, görüşlərin 4-5 fevral tarixlərində davam etməsi planlaşdırılır. Danışıqlarda Rusiya və Ukrayna nümayəndə heyətləri ilə yanaşı, ABŞ nümayəndələri də iştirak edir. Xatırladaq ki, ilkin olaraq üçtərəfli görüşün fevralın 1-də keçirilməsi planlaşdırılsa da, sonradan Ukrayna Prezidenti Volodimir Zelenski danışıqların təxirə salındığını açıqlamışdı. Tərəflər arasında danışıqlar bu il yanvarın 23-24-ü Əbu-Dabidə baş tutub.

title: Əliyev və Paşinyan nəyi
content: “Azərbaycan və Ermənistan cəmiyyətləri gündəlik həyatlarında sülhün real faydalarını görürlər”. “Qafqazinfo” Ermənistan hökumətinin Mətbuat xidmətinə istinadən xəbər verir ki, bu barədə Əbu-Dabidə Azərbaycan Prezidenti İlham Əliyev və Ermənistan Baş naziri Nikol Paşinyan arasında keçirilmiş görüş zamanı bildirilib. Məlumata görə, tərəflər ABŞ Prezidenti Donald Trampın vasitəçiliyi və şahidliyi ilə 2025-ci il avqustun 8-də Vaşinqtonda keçirilmiş Sülh Sammitində əldə edilmiş razılaşmaların icrasında qeydə alınan irəliləyişi alqışlayıblar. Onlar Ermənistanla Azərbaycan arasında münasibətlərin normallaşması prosesinin müsbət dinamikasının ikitərəfli formatda qorunub saxlanması və irəli aparılmasının əhəmiyyətini qeyd ediblər. “Tərəflər hər iki cəmiyyətin öz gündəlik həyatlarında sülhün real faydalarını artıq gördüklərini etiraf ediblər. Onlar ikitərəfli ticarətin başlamasından və Azərbaycandan Ermənistana neft məhsullarının davam edən ixracından, həmçinin üçüncü ölkələrdən Ermənistana taxıl və digər malların Azərbaycan ərazisindən tranzitinin həyata keçirilməsindən məmnunluqlarını ifadə ediblər”, - məlumatda deyilir. Prezident İlham Əliyev və Baş nazir Nikol Paşinyan “Beynəlxalq Sülh və Rifah naminə Tramp Marşrutu” (TRIPP) və digər infrastruktur layihələrinin həyata keçirilməsini müzakirə ediblər. Azərbaycanın Prezidenti və Ermənistanın Baş naziri iki ölkə arasında sülhün və sabitliyin daha da möhkəmləndirilməsi istiqamətində işi davam etdirməyə hazır olduqlarını təsdiqləyib və ikitərəfli münasibətlərin normallaşması prosesinə töhfə vermək məqsədilə əlaqələri davam etdirmək barədə razılığa gəliblər.

title: İranın tələbi qəbul edildi:
content: İran ABŞ ilə planlaşdırılan nüvə danışıqlarından bir neçə gün əvvəl görüşün yerinin və formatının dəyişdirilməsini tələb edib. Medianews.az xəbər verir ki, Tehran cümə günü İstanbulda keçirilməsi nəzərdə tutulan vacib görüşün Omanda baş tutmasını istəyib. ABŞ administrasiyası İranın bu tələbini qəbul edib. ABŞ prezidenti Donald Tramp İranla aparılan danışıqların aktiv şəkildə davam etdiyini açıqlayıb. Oval Ofisdə çıxışı zamanı Tramp bildirib ki, tərəflər konkret nəticə əldə etməyə çalışır. “Onlar nəsə etmək istəyirlər. Görək, bu, konkret nəticəyə çevriləcəkmi. Hazırda onlarla fəal şəkildə danışırıq,” – deyə Tramp vurğulayıb. Amerika mətbuatında yayılan xəbərlərə görə, Ağ Evin xüsusi nümayəndəsi Stiv Vitkov ilə İranın xarici işlər naziri Abbas Arakçinin cümə günü İstanbulda görüşməsi planlaşdırılırdı. Lakin İran tərəfinin tələbindən sonra danışıqların yerinin Omana dəyişdirilməsi qərara alınıb. ABŞ administrasiyası İranın bu istəyi ilə razılaşıb və görüşün Omanda baş tutacağını təsdiqləyib. Tramp çıxışında İranın nüvə obyektlərini hədəf alan “Gecəyarısı Çəkic” əməliyyatını da xatırladıb. Prezidentin sözlərinə görə, Tehran daha əvvəl də imkan əldə edib, lakin bu, nəticə verməyib. “Düşünmürəm ki, bunun bir daha baş verməsini istəsinlər. Onlar danışıqlar aparmaq istəyirlər. Biz hazırda onlarla fəal şəkildə əlaqədəyik,” – deyə Tramp bildirib. ABŞ prezidenti planlaşdırılan görüşlərin dəqiq vaxtı və yeri ilə bağlı əlavə detalları açıqlamayıb, lakin diplomatik təmasların davam edəcəyini bir daha təsdiqləyib. Medianews.az

“Yangi O‘zbekiston” massivlari soni 120 taga yetkaziladi.
content: Shavkat Mirziyoyev 3 fevral kuni urbanizatsiya va uy-joy qurilishida yangicha yondashuvlarni joriy etish bo‘yicha taqdimot bilan tanishdi. Unda renovatsiya ulushini oshirish va yangi turar joy massivlarini kengaytirish orqali aholining uy-joyga bo‘lgan talabini qondirish bo‘yicha qator takliflar ko‘rib chiqildi. Foto: Prezident matbuot xizmati Prezidentga taqdim etilgan ma’lumotlarga ko‘ra , so‘nggi 8 yilda mamlakatda 120 million kvadrat metr yoki 600 mingdan ziyod xonadonlar qurilib, foydalanishga topshirildi. Uy-joy sotib olishga ko‘maklashish maqsadida 541 ming nafar fuqaroga 103 trillion so‘m arzon ipoteka kreditlari va subsidiyalar ajratilgan. Shu bilan birga, davlat rahbari qilingan ishlar hali yetarli emasligini ta’kidladi. Har yili respublika bo‘yicha 200 mingtaga yaqin yangi oila tashkil topayotgani uy-joy, yo‘l va ijtimoiy infratuzilmaga talabni oshirayotgani qayd etildi. Hozirda aholining bir kishi boshiga o‘rtacha 18,9 kvadrat metr turar joy maydoni to‘g‘ri kelmoqda. Bu ko‘rsatkichni kamida 23 kvadrat metrga yetkazish uchun 2040 yilgacha yangi uy-joy qurilish sur’atini 280 mingtaga oshirish zarurligi aytildi. Yer resurslaridan samarali foydalanish nuqtai nazaridan aholi punktlarining tartibsiz kengayib borishi kelgusida ayrim hududlarda ekin yerlarining tanqisligiga olib kelishi mumkinligi ta’kidlandi. Shu munosabat bilan eskirgan uy-joy fondini yangilash va uy-joy qurilishida renovatsiya ulushini oshirish zarurligi qayd etildi. Takliflarga ko‘ra, renovatsiya hissasini hozirgi 15 foizdan 2040 yilga qadar 60 foizga yetkazish, shuningdek “Yangi O‘zbekiston” massivlarini barpo etish ishlarini kengaytirib, ularning sonini 120 taga yetkazish zarurligi bildirildi. Prezident taqdim etilgan takliflarni ma’qullab, sohada rejali va uzoq muddatli yondashuvlarni izchil joriy etish, belgilangan ko‘rsatkichlar ijrosini ta’minlash bo‘yicha mutasaddilarga tegishli topshiriqlar berdi.

title: Prosecutors seek life sentence for man who tried to shoot Trump at a Florida golf course
content: By DAVID FISCHER, Associated PressFORT PIERCE, Fla. (AP) — Federal prosecutors are set to ask that a man convicted of trying to assassinate President Donald Trump on a Florida golf course in 2024 be sentenced to life in prison at a hearing on Wednesday.Ryan Routh is scheduled to appear before U. S. District Judge Aileen Cannon in Fort Pierce. Her courtroom erupted into chaos in September shortly after jurors found Routh guilty on all counts, including attempting to kill a presidential candidate and several firearm-related charges. Routh tried to stab himself in the neck with a pen, and officers quickly dragged him out.FILE – In this image released by the Martin County, Fla., Sheriff’s Office, law enforcement officers arrest Ryan Wesley Routh, a man suspected in an apparent assassination attempt of Donald Trump, Sept. 15, 2024. (Martin County Sheriff’s Office via AP, File)Routh’s sentencing had initially been scheduled for December, but Cannon agreed to move the date back after Routh decided to use an attorney during the sentencing phase instead of representing himself as he did for most of the trial.Prosecutors said in a sentencing memorandum filed last month that Routh has yet to accept any responsibility for his actions and that he should spend the rest of his life in prison, in accordance with federal sentencing guidelines.“Routh remains unrepentant for his crimes, never apologized for the lives he put at risk, and his life demonstrates near-total disregard for law,” the memo said.Routh’s new defense attorney, Martin L. Roth, is asking the judge for a variance from sentencing guidelines: 20 years in prison on top of a seven-year, mandatory sentence for one of the gun convictions.“The defendant is two weeks short of being sixty years old,” Roth wrote in a filing. “A just punishment would provide a sentence long enough to impose sufficient but not excessive punishment, and to allow defendant to experience freedom again as opposed to dying in prison.”Related ArticlesTrump looks to rebuild critical mineral supply chains for everything from jet engines to smartphonesWhat Democrats are demanding in the fight over Immigration and Customs Enforcement fundingTrump accused of distorting history of Mexican-American War to justify heavy hand in Latin AmericaFederal immigration officials scout warehouses as they eye more detention spaceJudge: Deal reached to protect identities of Epstein victims in documents releaseProsecutors said Routh spent weeks plotting to...

content: TheStreet aims to feature only the best products and services. If you buy something via one of our links, we may earn a commission.Why we love this dealWe live in a tech-obsessed world, and while our electronics used to spend most of their time in our homes waiting to be used, these days it's normal to bring your favorite gadgets with you wherever you go. Rarely will you meet a working person who doesn't commute with their laptop in their bag, but as necessary as it may seem, it's not always ideal to have to worry about traveling with electronics, especially when they're far bigger than the standard smartphones we're all used to carrying 24/7. And when you want the capabilities of a laptop but don't want to deal with the size, you can't go wrong with a tablet. Touchscreen technology might have been expensive back when it was brand new, but these days you can find great tablet options for way less than you'd expect, and Walmart actually has an incredible deal selling a tablet for 51% off right now. The Tabewee T90 11-Inch Tablet, which usually retails for $200, is only $99 right now as part of a Walmart Flash deal. You can get the touchscreen with 128 gigabytes of data, and save over $100 for a limited time. Table T90 11-Inch Tablet, $99 (was $200) at Walmart Courtesy of Walmart Why do shoppers love it?As the world's first Android 16 tablet with Gemini AI 2.0 software, this tablet is built to optimize workflow, and use special AI technology to make your everyday tasks even easier to complete. It can transform voices into formatted files and documents, enhance low-light photos, summarize documents, and assist with writing and editing. Users can also have realtime, spoken conversations with Gemini Live, the conversational, voice-based AI feature for Android, that provides natural back-and-forth dialogue with Google's Gemini AI assistant. You can interrupt it, ask questions and follow-up questions, and explore topics in a hands-free way. It's great for brainstorming, learning, planning, and multitasking in general. But that's just the beginning. The 11-inch tablet with 1920x1200 resolution and anti-reflective, anti-finger print glass, takes pictures, can receive and start video calls, plays music, and streams TV and movies. The system has a 24GB RAM memory speed, which is sort of the "sweet spot" when it comes to running applications and managing data. Виталий Жуковский: "Моего сына Арсения в "Атырау" не будет"
content: — На первый сбор приехало 28 игроков. Тренерский штаб исходит из того, что оптимально для первых сборов нам необходимо 30 футболистов, так как мы идем от объема к интенсивности. Со второго сбора число футболистов уменьшится до 25 игроков. Могу сказать, что Жуковского Арсения в команде не будет, потому что я никогда не мешал личное с клубными делами. Добавлю, что эти игроки приехали исключительно за собственные средства, и клуб не несет на них никаких финансовых затрат. Эта новость вышла не просто так. В связи со сменой руководства у нас есть проблемы как внутренние, так и с комплектацией команды. На сегодняшний день мы работаем как в каменном веке: клуб даже не может продлить лицензию Polar Team Pro. Более того, мы последние собрались на учебно-тренировочные сборы в лиге. На сегодняшний день у нас заключены контракты с 10 игроками, а нужно 25. До начала чемпионата остается меньше месяца...

title: Epşteynin əsas varisi o imiş -
content: Yetkinlik yaşına çatmayan qızları hədəf alan fahişəlik şəbəkəsi qurduğuna görə həbs olunan və həbsxanada ölü tapılan milyarder Ceffri Epşteyn vəsiyyətnaməsini ölümündən iki gün əvvəl imzalayıbmış. “Qafqazinfo” xəbər verir ki, “1953-cü il Trastı” adlanan sənəd 630 milyon dollarlıq sərvətin 43 nəfər arasında bölüşdürülməsini nəzərdə tutur. ABŞ Ədliyyə Departamentinin açıqladığı sənədlərdən məlum olur ki, Epşteyn mirasının böyük hissəsini sonuncu partnyoruna, hazırda 35 yaşı olan belaruslu Karina Şulyaka vəsiyyət edib. O, maliyyə sənədinə əlavə edilmiş əlyazma qeydində qalmaqallı maliyyəçi Karina Şulyakla evlənmək niyyətini ifadə edib. Belə ki, Epşteyn partnyoruna 32,73 karat çəkisi olan və dəyəri bir neçə milyon dollar qiymətləndirilən brilyant üzüklə evlilik təklifi edibmiş. Epşteynlə təxminən 10 il ərzində münasibətdə olmuş Şulyak həm də ölümündən bir gün əvvəl onunla telefonla danışan sonuncu şəxs hesab olunur. Vəsiyyətnaməyə əsasən, C.Epşteynin ölümündən sonra K.Şulyak yarısını dərhal, digər yarısı isə illik müavinət şəklində olmaqla, 100 milyon dollar almalı idi. Maliyyəçinin bütün daşınmaz əmlakı belaruslu xanıma keçməli idi: - Manhettendə malikanə; - Parisdə mənzil; - Nyu-Meksikoda ranço; - ABŞ-nin Vircin adalarında yerləşən və “Pedofil adası” kimi tanınan “Kiçik Müqəddəs Ceyms” və “Böyük Müqəddəs Ceyms” adaları. Nişan üzüyündən əlavə, ona həmçinin 48 ədəd brilyant və xərclərini qarşılamaq üçün xüsusi fond ayrılmışdı. “1953-cü il Trastı”nın digər iki mühüm benefisiarı Ceffri Epşteynin şəxsi vəkili Darren İndik və mühasibi Riçard Kandır. Sənədə əsasən İndikə 50 milyon, Kana isə 25 milyon dollar çatacaqdı. Maliyyəçi bu şəxsləri vəsiyyətnaməsinin icraçıları və əmlakının idarəediciləri təyin etmişdi. Epşteynin uşaq istismarı şəbəkəsində əsas fiqur olan Gisleyn Maksvell də vəsiyyətnamədə özünə yer etməyi bacarmışdı. On il ərzində yetkinlik yaşına çatmayan qızların istismarı şəbəkəsindəki “rolu”na görə 240 ay həbs cəzasına məhkum etmiş Maksvel 10 milyon dollar almalı idi. Fotoda Ceffri Epşteyn və Gisleyn Maksvell Siyahıda həmçinin Epşteynin əməkdaşları, qulluqçuları, şəxsi pilotları, eləcə də bir neçə alim yer alıb. Yeddi benefisiarın adı isə açıqlanmır, onlara 3-10 milyon dollara qədər ayrılmışdı. Sənədə əsasən, vəsaitlər Epşteynin ölümündən azı iki il sonra ödənilməli idi. Bununla belə, hazırda benefisiarlardan hər hansı birinin bu...

Höcke erhielt als Kandidat für das Amt des Regierungschefs im Landtag 33 Ja- und 51 Nein-Stimmen bei einer Enthaltung. 45 Stimmen wären für einen Sturz von Voigt nötig gewesen.

Asrın felaketinde bölgeye ilk ulaşan ekip konuştu: Her bebek gördüğümde hafızamdan silinmeyen tabloyu hatırlıyorum
content: Kahramanmaraş'ta 6 Şubat 2023'te meydana gelen 7.7 ve 7.6 büyüklüğündeki depremlerin ardından bölgeye ulaşan ilk ekiplerde görevli sağlık çalışanları yaşadıklarını anlattı. Depremde hasar gören hastanenin yenidoğan bölümündeki 33 bebeği ambulansla güvenli bir hastaneye naklederek hayatlarını kurtaran Kayseri UMKE Sorumlusu İslam Köseoğlu, "Her bebek gördüğümde hafızamdan silinmeyen olayların başında geliyor" dedi. 6 Şubat 2023 tarihinde Kahramanmaraş'ta meydana gelen 7.7 ve 7.6 büyüklüğündeki depremler 11 ili etkilemiş ve birçok ilde büyük yıkımlara neden olmuştu. Depremlerin ardından Kayseri'den yola çıkan ve afetin ilk saatlerinde bölgeye ulaşan sağlık ekipleri yaşadıklarını anlattı. Kahramanmaraş'ta depremlerde hasar alan üniversite hastanesinin yenidoğan bölümündeki 33 bebeği ambulansla Kayseri'deki hastanelere nakleden Kayseri UMKE Sorumlusu İslam Köseoğlu, "6 Şubat gecesi Türkiye'yi sarsan ve 11 ili etkileyen bir deprem yaşandı. Kayseri de bu illerin arasındaydı. Depremin ilk yaşandığı saatten itibaren acil sağlık hizmetleri çalışanları olarak görev yerimize gitmek için hareket etmiştik. Öncesinde ailemizi güvenli yerlere emanet etmemiz gerekiyordu. Eşim de sağlık çalışanı, 3 tane oğlumu güvenli bir yere teslim etmemiz zor bir süreçti. Eşimi ve çocuklarımı teslim ettikten sonra İl Ambulans Servisi Başhekimliğine hareket ettim. Başhekimliğe geldikten sonra ekipler kuruldu ve özellikli olan 4 sedyeli ambulansla Kahramanmaraş'a hareket ettik. Özellikle Kayseri çıkışları, Pınarbaşı, Sarız ve Göksun çıkışlarında ciddi bir tipi söz konusuydu. Saat 09.45 itibarıyla Kahramanmaraş merkeze giriş yaptık. Gerçekten yaşamış olduğumuz afet, daha önceki depremlere benzemiyordu, enkaz sayıları çok fazlaydı. İlk gün kaç vakaya müdahale ettik hatırlamıyorum ama birçok vaka bizde de psikolojik olarak yıkım bıraktı ancak görevimizi en iyi şekilde yapmaya çalıştık. Üniversite hastanesi öğlen yaşanan büyük depremden sonra hasar almıştı. Oradaki yenidoğan bebeklerin tahliyeleri gerekiyordu. Görevli arkadaşlarımızla 33 tane yenidoğan bebeği ambulansların içerisine aldık. Birçoğunun oksijen ihtiyacı vardı, birçoğunun ısıtılması gerekiyordu, çünkü hava soğuktu. Bu süreçte Kayseri İl Sağlık Müdürümüz Mehmet Erşan ve Sağlık Hizmetleri Başkanımız Figen Gürbeden devreye girdi. Kayseri'deki bütün yenidoğan ambulansları, kuvöz...

title: Kripto piyasasında önlenemez düşüş! 14 ayın dibini gördü...
content: Altın ve gümüşteki fiyat hareketliliği yatırımcıların gündeminde kalmaya devam ederken, kripto para piyasası da yakından izleniyor. Son günlerde Bitcoin cephesinde yaşanan sert geri çekilme, piyasalarda tedirginliği artırdı. Bitcoin’de Sert Düzeltme: 14 Ayın En Düşük Seviyesi Kripto para piyasasının amiral gemisi Bitcoin, şubat ayı başında 72 bin 800 dolar seviyesine kadar gerileyerek Kasım 2024’ten bu yana en düşük seviyelerini test etti. Rekor fiyatların ardından gelen bu sert düzeltmede, kaldıraçlı işlemlerin tasfiye edilmesi ve kurumsal fon çıkışlarının etkili olduğu belirtiliyor. Piyasalarda artan satış baskısı, kısa sürede fiyatlarda belirgin bir dalgalanma yarattı. Kaldıraçlı İşlemler Tasfiye Oldu, Milyarlar Silindi Son satış dalgası özellikle yüksek riskli pozisyon alan yatırımcıları vurdu. Sektör verilerine göre, son 24 saat içinde yaklaşık 170 bin kaldıraçlı yatırımcının pozisyonu kapandı. Bu süreçte piyasadan toplamda 730 milyon doların üzerinde varlık silindi. Uzmanlar, volatilitenin artmasıyla birlikte kaldıraçlı işlemlerin riskinin bir kez daha ortaya çıktığına dikkat çekiyor. Kripto Fonlarında Büyük Çıkış Öte yandan küresel kripto fonları da satış baskısından nasibini aldı. ABD’de işlem gören ürünlerin öncülüğünde geçen hafta kripto fonlarından toplam 1,7 milyar dolarlık net çıkış yaşandı. Yönetilen toplam varlıklar ise Ekim 2025’te görülen zirveden bu yana yaklaşık 73 milyar dolar azaldı. Yatırımcı Michael Burry de Bitcoin’de yaşanan yaklaşık yüzde 40’lık düşüşün derinleşebileceği uyarısında bulunarak, son bir yılda büyük miktarda Bitcoin biriktiren şirketler için kalıcı zarar riskine işaret etti. Bitcoin Fiyatı Ne Kadar? Bitcoin, son düşüşlerin ardından toparlanma çabası gösterse de dalgalı seyrini sürdürüyor. Lider kripto para, şu sıralarda yaklaşık yüzde 3’lük kayıpla 76 bin 364 dolar seviyelerinde işlem görüyor.
creator: cnn türk

Hawley claimed that almost half of Netflix’s content for minor children pushes a transgender agenda and demanded answers from the streaming giant.

title: Rusya’nın enerji gelirleri eridi: Petrol ve doğal gazda yüzde 50 düşüş
content: Rusya Maliye Bakanlığı'ndan yapılan açıklamada, petrol fiyatlarının gerilemesi ve rublenin yabancı para birimleri karşısında değer kazanması nedeniyle ülkenin enerji ihracat gelirlerinin düştüğü belirtildi.Petrol ve doğal gazda planlanandan daha fazla gelir kaybı yaşandığı bilgisine yer verilen açıklamada, gelirlerin ocakta geçen yılın aynı ayına kıyasla yüzde 50,1 azalarak 393 milyar rubleye gerilediği aktarıldı.Batılı ülkeler, Rus petrol ve doğal gaz sektörüne kapsamlı yaptırımlar uygularken Rusya da enerji ihracatı için başta Asya olmak üzere farklı bölgelerde alternatif pazarlardaki payını artırmaya çalışıyor.G7 ve Avrupa Birliği (AB) ülkelerinin, Rusya'dan deniz yoluyla taşınan petrole yönelik ithalat yasağı ve varil başına 60 dolar tavan fiyat kararları, 5 Aralık 2022'de uygulamaya girmişti.Bu kapsamda, Rus petrolünün üçüncü ülkelere belirlenen fiyattan daha yüksek bir seviyede satılması durumunda G7 ve AB ülkelerindeki şirketler, bu petrole nakliye, sigorta ve aracılık gibi çeşitli hizmetleri sunamıyor. Söz konusu hizmetlerin sağlanabilmesi için Rus petrolünün tavan fiyatın altında işlem görmesi gerekiyor.Söz konusu tavan fiyat sınırı Temmuz 2025'te 47,6 dolara düşürülmüştü.Rusya: Trump Putin’den Kiev’e saldırıları bir hafta durdurmasını rica ettiRusya: İstanbul müzakereleriyle 2 bin 300'den fazla Rus, yaklaşık 2 bin 400 Ukrayna askeri evine döndüGörüntüler yıllar öncesinden: Putin şeytani Epstein sapkınlıklarını biliyor muydu?

Geldanlage im Norden: Prozessbeginn gegen Weinhändler aus Sylt – Betrug mit Wein?
content: Luxuswein und hohe Rendite – doch viele Anleger bekamen das Geld nie zu sehen. Ein ehemaliger Weinhändler aus Sylt steht nach einem Millionenschaden vor Gericht.Vor dem Kieler Landgericht hat der Prozess gegen einen ehemaligen Weinhändler aus Westerland auf Sylt begonnen. Die Staatsanwaltschaft wirft dem 57-Jährigen vor, die Insolvenz seines Unternehmens absichtlich verzögert und in 124 Fällen betrogen zu haben. Seit 2003 leitete der Mann laut Staatsanwalt Mark-Philipp Weißleder einen Weinhandel mit Gastronomiebereich sowie ein Geschäft für Küchenartikel und Feinkost.Spätestens Ende November 2018 war das Unternehmen zahlungsunfähig, erklärte Weißleder. Zu diesem Zeitpunkt standen Verbindlichkeiten von rund 1,6 Millionen Euro einer Unterdeckung von 1,5 Millionen Euro gegenüber. Der Angeklagte hätte bis Ende 2018 Insolvenz anmelden müssen, reichte den Antrag jedoch erst im Januar 2020 beim Amtsgericht Niebüll ein.Zwischen Dezember 2018 und Oktober 2019 soll der Mann zudem Investoren durch falsche Angaben über seine Bonität für verschiedene Anlagemodelle gewonnen haben. Dabei entstand ein Gesamtschaden von mehr als 2,6 Millionen Euro. Ziel war es laut Staatsanwalt, eine Einnahmequelle zu schaffen und den Betrieb aufrechtzuerhalten.Investitionsmodell mit Weinen und CognacLaut Weißleder konnten Käufer beim Angeklagten größere Mengen Wein, Champagner oder Cognac bestellen. Sie mussten sofort zahlen, erhielten die Ware jedoch nicht direkt. Innerhalb einer festgelegten Frist durften sie die Bestellung stornieren, ihr Geld zurückfordern und zusätzlich eine Rendite einstreichen - woher diese Rendite kommen sollte, wurde aus den Angaben des Staatsanwalts nicht deutlich. Verzichteten sie nicht auf die Lieferung, musste die Ware ausgeliefert werden.Der Weinhändler bot das Investitionsmodell den Angaben nach bereits seit 2012 an. Doch nach der Insolvenz traten Unregelmäßigkeiten auf: Käufer investierten oft in hunderte Flaschen seltenen und teuren Wein, Champagner oder Cognac und überwiesen dem Angeklagten dafür zehntausende Euro. Verzichteten sie jedoch auf die Ware und erwarteten eine Rendite, erhielten sie häufig zu wenig Geld oder gar nichts zurück. Zudem wurde in anderen Fällen auch keine Ware ausgeliefert. Stattdessen nutzte der Angeklagte die Beträge, um frühere Investments oder andere Schulden zu begleichen. Kaufte ein Kunde etwa 1.500 Flaschen "Laurent Perrier Cuvée Rosé Brut" Champagner, zahlte er rund 100.000 Euro an das...
